Abstract. During Britain's so-called ‘golden age of bodybuilding’ during the s and s, Oscar Heidenstam, through his National Amateur Bodybuilders Association (NABBA) and Health and Strength magazine, elevated the annual Mr Universe Contest in London into the world's most prestigious physique competition.
